text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As a horsegirl of the Mejiro family, discipline 
and self-control are indispensable……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Yes, this is likely one of 
the trials that I must face.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
No matter what the temptation may be… 
Even if it's the cafeteria's special, limited 
Mont Blanc……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'll prove that I can endure…… two kinds of chestnuts… uuh.
